name: @kiali/kiali-ui
homepage-comment: *Do not* change this setting if you wish run Kiali under different server root.
Instead update 'web_root' in Kaili config map in OpenShift console.
author: Red Hat
script-comments: When adding new scripts, please be careful to using `npm run` instead of `yarn` for the tasks.
Some build environments we use do not include npm access, and installing yarn is not possible.

scripts.backup-rcue: if [ ! -f node_modules/patternfly/dist/css/rcue.css.copy ]; then mv node_modules/patternfly/dist/css/rcue.css node_modules/patternfly/dist/css/rcue.css.copy; touch node_modules/patternfly/dist/css/rcue.css; fi
scripts.build: if [ "${KIALI_ENV}" = "production" ]; then npm run build:prod; else npm run build:dev; fi
scripts.build:dev: npm run remove-rcue; REACT_APP_RCUE=false npm run build:kiali
scripts.build:kiali: npm run lint:prod && npm run copy-fonts && npm run copy-img && npm run build-css && REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version REACT_APP_NAME=$npm_package_name REACT_APP_GIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) react-scripts-ts build
scripts.build:prod: npm run restore-rcue; REACT_APP_RCUE=true npm run build:kiali
scripts.precommit: (npm run prettier -- --list-different || (echo 'Above file(s) were modified by prettier, check them before commiting' && false) ) && npm run lint:prod
scripts.remove-rcue: npm run backup-rcue ; npm run backup-rcue-additions
scripts.start: if [ "${KIALI_ENV}" = "production" ]; then npm run start:prod; else npm run start:dev; fi
scripts.start:dev: npm run remove-rcue; REACT_APP_RCUE=false npm run start:kiali
scripts.start:kiali: npm run copy-fonts && npm run copy-img && npm run build-css && REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version REACT_APP_NAME=$npm_package_name REACT_APP_GIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) react-scripts-ts start
scripts.start:prod: npm run restore-rcue; REACT_APP_RCUE=true npm run start:kiali
